backend/main.mo: Defines the backend actor with task, recurring chore, cooking assignment, and profile types plus authorization‑protected CRUD operations and in‑memory state maps.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing two UI image‑update features with associated components, tests, and metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Existing summarized descriptions of all frontend source files used across the app, including components, hooks, utilities, and styles.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base and theme variable definitions providing light/dark mode OKLCH color palettes and standardized UI tokens.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling authentication, theme setup, loading states, and rendering TodayFocus with tabbed navigation for core views.
frontend/src/components/AddTaskDialog.ts: Dialog for creating tasks with voice dictation, actor availability checks, and form submission handling including principal parsing.
frontend/src/components/CalendarDayPlann: Daily planner view that groups tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores for a selected date with navigation and completion toggling.
frontend/src/components/CalendarView.tsx: Main calendar UI that loads tasks, cooking assignments, recurring chores, and profiles, and renders month/week/day views with navigation and date selection.
frontend/src/components/CalendarWeekPlan: Displays a weekly planner with tasks, cooking assignments, and chores per day, including navigation and task completion handling.
frontend/src/components/DinnerRota.tsx: Manages weekly cooking assignments with editing dialogs, voice dictation, fairness stats, and profile-based assignment controls.
frontend/src/components/EditTaskDialog.t: Dialog for editing tasks, supporting voice dictation, date picking, assignee selection, and updating task fields.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying credits and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar showing app branding and authenticated user menu with logout support.
frontend/src/components/HeroHeader.tsx: Reusable hero banner component displaying an image with optional title and subtitle overlays.
frontend/src/components/LightweightMonth: Renders a monthly calendar grid showing tasks, cooking assignments, and recurring chores, with navigation and date selection controls.
frontend/src/components/LoginScreen.tsx: Displays the login page with Internet Identity authentication and introductory visuals.
frontend/src/components/People.tsx: Manages viewing, adding, editing, and deleting person profiles with color selection and principal handling.
frontend/src/components/PersonBadge.tsx: Shows a small colored badge for a person label with optional styling and size props.
frontend/src/components/PersonProfileSel: Provides a selector to choose a person profile or manually enter a principal ID, with an option to auto-fill the user's own principal.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresD: Full-screen dialog for creating, editing, deleting, and pausing recurring chores with voice dictation, validation, and principal assignment.
frontend/src/components/RecurringChoresI: Displays a collapsible inline overview of grouped recurring chores with a Manage button and loading states.
frontend/src/components/TaskList.tsx: Displays, groups, and manages household tasks with add, edit, delete, and completion actions, integrating dialogs and profile data.
frontend/src/components/TodayFocus.tsx: Shows tasks due today and today's cooking assignment, loading all required data and rendering summaries.
frontend/src/components/VoiceDictationBu: Renders a microphone button with tooltip and listening indicator, handling supported, disabled, and active dictation states.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorWithReadiness: Wraps useActor to provide readiness, initialization, and error state for safely gating backend mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication state, login/logout actions, and identity persistence via an application-wide context.
frontend/src/hooks/usePeopleProfilesQuer: Implements queries and mutations for person profiles using the backend actor, including readiness checks and cache invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend task operations with actor readiness checks and toast feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionStorageStat: React hook that syncs state to sessionStorage with safe read/write handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useVoiceDictation.ts: Custom hook managing Web Speech API dictation, handling permissions, errors, and transcript updates.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme variables and global base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering App.
frontend/src/types/webSpeech.d.ts: TypeScript declarations for Web Speech API interfaces including SpeechRecognition.
frontend/src/utils/actorAvailability.ts: Utilities to check backend actor readiness and throw user-friendly errors when unavailable.
Helpers for formatting and stringifying actor initialization diagnostic logs.
frontend/src/utils/candidOption.ts: Utilities ensuring consistent encoding of optional Candid values, especially Principals.
frontend/src/utils/cookingAssignmentLabe: Functions to derive display labels and colors for cooking assignments based on profiles.
frontend/src/utils/deploymentDiagnostics: Diagnostic logging utilities for tracking deployment and initialization steps with guidance on failures.
frontend/src/utils/fairness.ts: Computes cooking assignment counts and colors within a selected date range and identifies most/least cooked labels.
frontend/src/utils/personProfiles.ts: Provides helpers to resolve principals to display labels/colors and generate shortened principal strings.
frontend/src/utils/principal.ts: Safely parses and validates principal strings, returning structured success/error results.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreDiagnos: Logs structured start and outcome details for recurring chore mutations with safe error stringification.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoreMutatio: Normalizes recurring chore mutation errors into user messages and diagnostic details.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresPrevie: Generates weekday-grouped and upcoming recurring chore views and maps timeline enums to labels.
frontend/src/utils/recurringChoresSchedu: Determines whether recurring chores appear on specific dates based on timeline rules and filters chores by date.
frontend/src/utils/taskDayKey.ts: Converts due dates and Date objects into normalized yyyy-MM-dd day keys.
frontend/src/utils/taskDueDayGrouping.ts: Groups tasks by normalized due-date day keys and produces sorted day groups including a no-due-date bucket.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them when needed.
frontend/src/utils/voiceDictationDiagnos: Implements console-based diagnostics for voice dictation events and environment checks.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, animations, plugins, and layout settings for the frontend.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, known issues, feature requirements, and image replacement tasks for the UI.
